H3.text: when did the flash first appear on arrow. second season

A4.text: The third season includes the first annual crossover with spin-off series The Flash: 'Flash vs. Arrow'.

A5.text: The third season of the American television series Arrow premiered on The CW on October 8, 2014, and concluded on May 13, 2015, with a total of 23 episodes.

A6.text: The character, portrayed by Grant Gustin, was set to appear in three episodes of season two of Arrow, with the final one acting as a backdoor pilot for the new series.
